channel.title: Bill Maher on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Bill Maher Defends Jimmy Kimmel While Reflecting on His Own ABC Late Night Controversy: “I Am With You, I Support You”
item.description: “If this firing goes for you the way it did for me, you’ll get 23 years on a better network,” Maher said on the Friday episode of HBO’s ‘Real Time.’

item.title: ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ Suspension Echoes an Earlier ABC Late Night Controversy
item.description: Bill Maher was excoriated for comments about 9/11 on ‘Politically Incorrect,’ but the network didn’t pull the show.

item.title: Bill Maher Condemns “People Who Mocked” Charlie Kirk’s Death: “I Think You’re Gross”
item.description: The ‘Real Time’ host further addressed the widespread reaction Kirk’s assassination sparked on social media.

item.title: Billy Joel Breaks Silence About Brain Disorder: “I Feel Good”
item.description: The “Piano Man," speaking on Bill Maher’s podcast, says doctors are working on his Normal Pressure Hydrocephalus (NPH) condition, which impacts his balance and leaves him feeling “like being a boat.”

item.title: Billy Joel Breaks Silence About Brain Disorder: “I Feel Good”
item.description: The “Piano Man," speaking on Bill Maher’s podcast, says doctors are working on his Normal Pressure Hydrocephalus (NPH) condition, which impacts his balance and leaves him feeling “like being a boat.”

item.title: Billy Joel Sits Down With Bill Maher for Post-Brain Disorder Diagnosis Interview
item.description: The “Piano Man” singer is set to appear on the ‘Club Random’ podcast next week, with a video clip from the interview released on Friday.
